Posts.Content: i am a 15 year old male. please help me im worried about a lump under my right nipple and am hoping it is not cancer. it feels about 2-3 cm in diameter and is just a dense mass under my right nipple. my other one is fine and is soft. http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/7...plehelp1jj.png thats a diagram i drew. please help me thanks.
Posts.Title: DOCTORS HELP (can a 15 year old boy get BREAST CANCER?)
